byline.contributor: Elizabeth Harris and Richard Pérez-Peña contributed reporting from New York.

abstract: Military recruiting centers around country remain open day after deadly shooting at recruiting station in Chattanooga, Tenn, most with no additional security.
lead_paragraph: The day after a gunman began a deadly attack at a Tennessee recruiting station, similar centers tried to remain as welcoming as possible, officials said.

headline.main: Military Recruiting Centers Keep Their Doors Open After Deadly Attack
headline.print_headline: Military Recruiting Centers Keep Their Doors Open After Deadly Attack
